description: While walking down a street, Pikachu and Goh`s Grookey noticed something in some bushes and it ended up being this Bellsprout but it was in poor condition. Grookey healed it and became friends with Bellsprout and got one of Goh`s Pok√© Balls out indicating that he should catch it which he did.
name: Madatsubomi (Gou)
